name: Eugenie
desc: An enthusiastic vendor who specializes in selling fresh produce. She's able to routinely sell imported goods alongside local specialties due to the advanced water routes in Fontaine.

imgDesc.text: Court of Fontaine: Vasari Passage - Fontaine

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Sometimes, even the most ordinary produce vendors experience the most extraordinary things! One time, while traveling back to Fontaine, Eugenie was accosted by a band of Eremites. Her unexpected response: "Try some fruit!" Not only were the hungry mercenaries won over by her tasty fruit, but they were inspired to earn an honest living by selling Ajilenakh Nuts in Sumeru...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When the battle begins, all opposing characters gain 1 Energy.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Eremite Scorching Loremaster
customize.desc:
"Poetry and Secret Histories" Eremite Scorching Loremaster

Those who still remember will never betray the spirit of the sands yet flowing through their veins.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Zaytun Peach
customize.desc: The fruit of a forest shrub. Its flesh is firm and sweet. It is said to have a calming effect on the mind.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Ajilenakh Nut
customize.desc: A fruit that grows on evergreen trees within desert oases. The flesh under the tough skin is thick, sweet, and delicious, making it an important food source amongst the desert peoples.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Cabbage
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Valberry
customize.desc: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Rainbow Rose
customize.desc: A delicate and tender pink flower. Despite their name, Rainbow Roses are essentially more akin to Lilies.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.
